title: The Orphan Army
description: David Gale at Simon & Schuster has acquired the first two books in a debut middle-grade series by Rot & Ruin author Jonathan Maberry. In the series, called The Nightsiders, human and monster teens work together to defend the earth from alien invaders. Book #1 pubs in summer 2015; Sara Crowe at Harvey Klinger brokered the deal for world rights.
author: Jonathan Maberry
